billEvents.eventText: referred to corporations, authorities and commissions

title: Requires that 75% of a not-for-profit's board members be residents of the same community in which such organization is located
summary: Requires that a not-for-profit organization located in a city with a population of a million or more, ensure that 75% of its board members be residents of the same community in which such organization is located.
actClause: AN ACT to require seventy-five percent of the board members of a not-for-profit organization located in a city of a million or more to be residents of the same community in which such organization is located
